text: It turns out, Jennifer Lopez ‘ s daughter Emme is her mini - me in more ways than one! The proud mama shared a video to Instagram on Thursday, Dec. 14, showing the nine - year - old — whose dad is Marc Anthony — singing in what ’ s believed to be her school ’ s 2017 Christmas pageant. Watch the adorable clip below! Needless to say, fans went crazy over the video, which also highlights Emme ’ s personality. In the short clip, she lip - syncs the lead singer ’ s lines ( like her mom, she ’ s not destined for backup vocals! ) and flashes a big smile at the camera. “ Aww, to be blessed with jlo genes.
